Text:
Thx for this, very important for peps to understand money and banking, a degree in economics is not needed. 

Just some commn sense and to be able to see that money is just a control mechanism...

very clear, well researched and presented, there is another video available on google video called "money as debt", which explains the whole cycle like child's play. having watched that first i was able to make sense of what these guys were saying before they explained,
abz2000.com
